name: Creeping Deck: Pharaoh's Curse Prologue
description:
The prologue only gives you access to the first 3 temples

Embark on a journey through Ancient Egypt as you conquer dungeons and face mythological creatures. Build and refine your deck as you progress through each dungeon, facing off against bosses and enemies. Uncover hidden treasures, and discover powerful artifacts, potions, and epic cards, upgrade, unlock new skills and options in order to protect all of Egypt!



  • More than 100 cards available to build your deck
  • Face up to 10+ type of enemies: Giants, Zombies, Impious and more.
  • Boss fights! You'll encounter 1 boss per dungeon
  • Upgrade your character, increase HP or energy level, unlock rest options and more in the dungeons!



  • Unlock definitive upgrades for your character in the God's Lair
  • Start your run by choosing a set of initial cards with a random artifact
  • Each battle unlocks new cards and artifacts for you to use in your deck
  • Open chests to find new loot such as artifacts, potions or epic cards!



Creeping Deck is the first collaboration of Tavrox Games (Overboss, Neurodeck) and Miju Games (Planet crafters), two indie game studios originating from the same city in the south of France, joining forces to create challenging and strategic experiences through gaming!
